<table border="0" width="100%"> <tbody> <tr> <td align="justify" width="320"> <p> <a href="index.html"><img border="0" alt="Original VRML banana model 1994" title="Original VRML banana model 1994" hspace="10" src="originals/ios8-cyberbanana.png" width="72" height="108" align="middle"/></a> <a href="index.html"><img border="0" alt="Scanned banana data preparation 2017" title="Scanned banana data preparation 1997" hspace="10" src="VirtualBananaEditScreenShot.png" width="192" height="108" align="middle"/></a> </p> <p> <a href="index.html"><img border="0" alt="3D scan test case: preparation with April-tag registration marks" title="3D scan test case: preparation with April-tag registration marks" hspace="10" src="HammingBrickPreparationFor3dScan.jpg" width="144" height="108" align="middle"/></a> &nbsp; &nbsp; <a href="index.html"><img border="0" alt="3D scan test case: Hamming brick, reconstructed" title="3D scan test case: Hamming brick, reconstructed" hspace="10" src="HammingBrickConvexHullWireFrame.png" width="103" height="108" align="middle"/></a> </p> </td> <td align="left"> <p> This chapter explores the use of <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/3D_scanner" target="_blank">3D scanners</a> to produce X3D models. </p> <p> On 22 July 2016, the <a href="https://www.web3d.org/working-groups/computer-aided-design-cad" target="_blank">Web3D Consortium CAD Working Group</a> held our initial workshop at the <a href="http://web3d2016.org/program" target="_blank">Web3D 2016 Conference</a>. Participants explored how to achieve a combined X3D Profile for CAD, 3D&nbsp;Printing and 3D&nbsp;Scanning. Much coordinated work has occurred since then. </p> <p> The following workshop and VR&nbsp;Hackathon were held as part of the <a href="http://web3d2017.org" target="_blank">Web3D 2017 Conference</a> on 2-7&nbsp;June&nbsp;2017 in Brisbane Australia. Activities included <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AYg3qefp1SI" target="_blank">Virtual Banana Scanning</a> with <a href="VirtualBananaOriginalIndex.html">original&nbsp;model&nbsp;(1994)</a> and <a href="VirtualBananaReducedIndex.html">new&nbsp;model&nbsp;(2017)</a> results posted here. </p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table>
